description.english: Win a campaign mission on Insane difficulty
description.french: Remporter une mission de campagne en difficulté démente
description.italian: Vinci una campagna a difficoltà Folle
description.russian: Пройти миссию кампании на безумном уровне сложности
description.schinese: 在“疯狂”难度下赢得战役任务
description.spanish: Gana una misión de campaña en dificultad Locura

description.english: Attain the rank of Chancellor
description.french: Atteindre le rang de Chancelier
description.italian: Raggiungi il grado di Cancelliere
description.schinese: 获得总理头衔
description.spanish: Alcanza el puesto de Canciller

description.english: Attain the rank of Commander
description.french: Atteindre le rang de Commandant
description.italian: Raggiungi il grado di Comandante
description.schinese: 获得指挥官头衔
description.spanish: Alcanza el puesto de Comandante

description.english: Attain the rank of High Commander
description.french: Atteindre le rang de Haut commandant
description.italian: Raggiungi il grado di Comandante Supremo
description.schinese: 获得最高指挥官头衔
description.spanish: Alcanza el puesto de Alto Comandante

description.english: Attain the rank of Expedition President
description.french: Atteindre le rang de Président d'expédition
description.italian: Raggiungi il grado di Presidente della Spedizione
description.schinese: 获得探险队总统的头衔
description.spanish: Alcanza el puesto de Presidente de la expedición

description.english: Complete 100 building upgrades
description.french: Améliorer 100 bâtiments
description.italian: Hai effettuato l'upgrade di 100 costruzioni
description.schinese: 完成 100 次建筑物升级
description.spanish: Completa 100 mejoras de edificios

description.english: Build 100 farming structures
description.french: Construire 100 structures agricoles
description.italian: Costruisci 100 strutture agricole
description.schinese: 修建 100 个农业结构
description.spanish: Construye 100 estructuras de agricultura

description.english: Build 200 Solar Panels
description.french: Construire 200 panneaux solaires
description.italian: Costruisci 200 Pannelli Solari
description.schinese: 建造 200 个太阳能电池板
description.spanish: Construye 200 paneles solares

displayName.french: Désolé, on ne sert pas les mineurs
displayName.schinese: 对不起，我们不招待矿工
displayName.spanish: Perdona, pero no servimos a mineros

description.english: Build 100 Mines or Laser Mines
description.french: Construire 100 mines ou mines laser
description.italian: Costruisci 100 Miniere o Miniere Laser
description.schinese: 修建 100 个矿山或激光矿
description.spanish: Construye 100 minas o minas láser

description.english: Destroy 50 Creep Spores before they reach your colony
description.french: Éliminer 50 spores rampantes avant qu'elles n'atteignent la colonie
description.german: Zerstöre 50 Creep-Sporen, bevor sie deine Kolonie erreichen
description.italian: Distruggi 50 Spore del Verme prima che raggiungano la tua colonia
description.russian: Уничтожить 50 спор крипа до того, как они достигнут вашей колонии
description.schinese: 在蠕变孢子到达殖民地之前摧毁 50 个蠕变孢子
description.spanish: Destruye 50 esporas reptadoras antes de que alcancen tu colonia

description.english: Recycle 100 structures
description.french: Recycler 100 structures
description.italian: Ricicla 100 strutture
description.schinese: 回收利用 100 个结构
description.spanish: Recicla 100 estructuras

description.english: Accept 2000 immigrants
description.french: Accueillir 2 000 immigrants
description.italian: Accetta 2000 immigrati
description.schinese: 接收 2000 个移民
description.spanish: Acepta a 2000 inmigrantes

description.english: Complete 100 trade contracts
description.french: Remplir 100 contrats commerciaux
description.italian: Firma 100 contratti commerciali
description.schinese: 完成 100 个贸易合同
description.spanish: Completa 100 contratos de comercio

description.english: Protect the colony from 100 lightning strikes
description.french: Protéger la colonie contre 100 éclairs
description.italian: Proteggi la colonia da 100 fulmini
description.schinese: 保护殖民地不受 100 次雷击的伤害
description.spanish: Protege la colonia de 100 relámpagos

description.english: Deplete 10 Mineral Deposits
description.french: Épuiser 10 gisements de minerai
description.italian: Esaurisci 10 Depositi di Minerali
description.schinese: 耗尽 10 个矿床
description.spanish: Agota 10 depósitos de minerales

description.english: Build 10 Retail Centers
description.french: Construire 10 centres commerciaux
description.italian: Costruisci 10 Punti Vendita
description.schinese: 修建 10 个零售中心
description.spanish: Construye 10 centros de ventas

description.english: Get 1000 colonists in the same colony
description.french: Disposer de 1 000 colons au sein de la même colonie
description.italian: Raduna 1000 coloni nella stessa colonia
description.russian: Достичь численности в 1 000 колонистов в одной колонии
description.schinese: 同一殖民地获得 1000 个殖民者
description.spanish: Consigue a 1000 colonos en la misma colonia

description.english: Survive for 50 sols in any mission
description.french: Survivre 50 sols dans n'importe quelle mission
description.german: Überlebe 50 Sols lang in einer beliebigen Mission
description.italian: Sopravvivi per 50 sol in una missione
description.schinese: 在任何任务中存活 50 艾文年
description.spanish: Sobrevive durante 50 días solares en cualquier misión

description.english: Own 3 fully functional megastructures in the same colony simultaneously
description.french: Posséder 3 mégastructures simultanément opérationnelles au sein de la même colonie
description.german: Besitze 3 voll funktionsfähige Megabauten gleichzeitig in derselben Kolonie
description.italian: Ottieni 3 megastrutture funzionanti nella stessa colonia allo stesso tempo
description.russian: Владеть 3 полностью функционирующими мегасооружениями в одной колонии одновременно
description.schinese: 在同一个殖民地同时拥有 3 个功能齐全的巨型结构
description.spanish: Ten 3 megaestructuras totalmente funcionales en la misma colonia simultáneamente

description.english: Own 10 fully functional Parks in the same colony simultaneously
description.french: Disposer de 10 parcs simultanément opérationnels au sein de la même colonie
description.german: Besitze 10 voll funktionsfähige Parks gleichzeitig in derselben Kolonie
description.italian: Ottieni 10 Parchi funzionanti nella stessa colonia allo stesso tempo
description.russian: Иметь 10 полностью функционирующих парков в одной колонии одновременно
description.schinese: 在同一个殖民地同时拥有 10 个功能齐全的公园
description.spanish: Ten 10 parques totalmente funcionales en la misma colonia simultáneamente

description.english: Manufacture 1000 Candy
description.french: Produire 1 000 sucreries
description.italian: Produci 1000 Caramelle
description.schinese: 制造 1000 糖果
description.spanish: Fabrica 1000 dulces

description.english: Enable a Colony Boost
description.french: Activer un boost de colonie
description.italian: Attiva un Booster Colonia
description.schinese: 启用殖民地强化
description.spanish: Activa una potenciación de colonia

description.english: Enable 10 Social Policies or Powers simultaneously
description.french: Activer 10 politiques sociales ou pouvoirs simultanément
description.italian: Attiva 10 Politiche o Poteri Sociali contemporaneamente
description.schinese: 同时启用 10 个社会政策或权力
description.spanish: Activa 10 políticas sociales o poderes simultáneamente

description.english: Activate a Unity Artifact
description.french: Activer un artefact de cohésion
description.italian: Attiva un Artefatto Unità
description.schinese: 激活团结遗迹
description.spanish: Activa un artefacto de unidad

description.english: Activate a Cleansing Artifact
description.french: Activer un artefact purificateur
description.italian: Attiva un Artefatto Purezza
description.schinese: 激活清洗工件
description.spanish: Activa un artefacto purificador

description.english: Activate an Empowerment Artifact
description.french: Activer un artefact de puissance
description.italian: Attiva un Artefatto Potenza
description.schinese: 激活授权工艺品
description.spanish: Activa un artefacto de autonomía

description.english: Activate a Shielding Artifact
description.french: Activer un artefact de protection
description.italian: Attiva un Artefatto Scudo
description.schinese: 激活防护工件
description.spanish: Activa un artefacto de blindaje

description.english: Bring 20 units of Sandworm Meat back to the colony
description.french: Rapporter 20 unités de viande de ver de sable à la colonie
description.italian: Riporta 20 unità di Carne di Arenicola alla colonia
description.russian: Доставить в колонию 20 единиц мяса песчаных червей
description.schinese: 将 20 个单位的沙虫肉带回殖民地
description.spanish: Trae 20 unidades de carne de gusano de arena a la colonia

description.english: Reveal 95% of the fog on an expedition map
description.french: Révéler 95 % d'une carte d'expédition
description.german: Decke 95 % des Nebels einer Expeditionskarte auf
description.italian: Rimuovi il 95% di nebbia in una mappa
description.schinese: 在探险地图上揭开 95% 的迷雾
description.spanish: Revela el 95 % de la niebla en un mapa de expedición

description.english: Rescue 25 lost explorers
description.french: Sauver 25 explorateurs égarés
description.italian: Salva 25 esploratori dispersi
description.schinese: 营救 25 位迷路的探险家
description.spanish: Rescata a 25 exploradores perdidos

description.english: Keep 5 Expedition Centers operational simultaneously
description.french: Disposer de 5 centres d'expéditions simultanément opérationnels
description.italian: Mantieni attivi 5 Centri di Spedizione allo stesso tempo
description.schinese: 同时让 5 个探险中心运作
description.spanish: Ten 5 centros de expediciones operando simultáneamente

description.english: Explore 50 points of interest on expedition maps
description.french: Explorer 50 points d'intérêt sur les cartes d'expédition
description.italian: Esplora 50 punti di interesse sulle mappe
description.russian: Исследовать 50 точек интереса на карте экспедиции
description.schinese: 探索探险地图上的 50 个兴趣点
description.spanish: Explora 50 puntos de interés en mapas de expedición

description.english: Distribute a total of 500 enhancers
description.french: Distribuer un total de 500 stimulants
description.italian: Distribuisci un totale di 500 potenziatori
description.schinese: 总共分发 500 增强剂
description.spanish: Distribuye un total de 500 mejoradores

description.english: Win 5 referendum elections in a row with at least 90% of the vote
description.french: Gagner 5 référendums de suite avec au moins 90 % des votes
description.german: Gewinne 5 Referenden nacheinander mit mindestens 90 % der Stimmen
description.italian: Vinci 5 referendum di fila con almeno il 90% dei voti
description.russian: Выиграть 5 выборов подряд, набрав не менее 90% голосов
description.schinese: 在连续 5 次公投中，至少赢得 90% 的选票
description.spanish: Gana 5 referéndums seguidos con al menos el 90 % de los votos

description.english: Receive 10 warnings from Commissioner Veronika
description.french: Recevoir 10 avertissements de la part du Haut fonctionnaire Veronika
description.german: Erhalte 10 Warnungen von der Beauftragten Veronika
description.italian: Ricevi 10 avvisi dalla Commissaria Veronika
description.schinese: 收到 Veronika 局长的 10 次警告
description.spanish: Recibe 10 advertencias de la inspectora Veronika

description.english: Get 50 colonists infected by the plague
description.french: Disposer de 50 colons infectés en même temps
description.german: Stecke 50 Kolonisten gleichzeitig mit der Seuche an
description.italian: Fai infettare dalla peste 50 coloni contemporaneamente
description.schinese: 已同时让 50 个殖民者感染瘟疫
description.spanish: Ten a 50 colonos infectados por la plaga simultáneamente

description.english: Have 200 colonists unemployed simultaneously
description.french: Disposer de 200 colons sans emploi en même temps
description.italian: Fai perdere il lavoro a 200 coloni contemporaneamente
description.schinese: 同时让 200 个殖民者失业
description.spanish: Ten a 200 colonos desempleados simultáneamente

description.english: Complete Vanaar by the end of Sol 5 (in campaign mode at Normal difficulty or higher)
description.french: A terminé Vanaar avant la fin du 5e sol (en mode campagne en difficulté normale ou plus)
description.german: Vanaar bis zum Ende von Sol 5 abgeschlossen (im Kampagnenmodus auf "Normal" oder höher)
description.italian: Hai completato Vanaar entro la fine del Sol 5
description.russian: Завершен Vanaar к концу 5 сола (в режиме кампании на обычной сложности или выше)
description.schinese: 已在 5 艾文年后完成 Vanaar（在“普通”或更高难度的战役模式下）
description.spanish: Completa Vanaar antes de que finalice el día solar 5

description.english: Reach a population of 350 colonists in Azara Falls by the end of Sol 5 (in campaign mode at Normal difficulty or higher)
description.french: Atteindre 350 colons aux Azara Falls avant la fin du 5e sol (mode campagne, difficulté normale)
description.german: Habe in Azara Falls 350 Kolonisten bis zum Ende von Sol 5 (Kampagne, "Normal")
description.italian: Raduna 350 coloni nelle Azara Falls entro la fine del Sol 5  (mod. campagna, diff. Normale)
description.russian: Достичь числ. населения в 350 жителей в Azara Falls к концу 5 сола (кампания, норм. сложн.)
description.schinese: 在 5 艾文年后让 Azara Falls 的殖民者人数达到 350（在“普通”或更高难度的战役模式下）
description.spanish: Consigue 350 colonos en Azara Falls antes del fin del día solar 5 (Campaña, dificultad Normal)
